issue.title: [CF 36] Clarification of new linked-to-icon-state in v2
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Set up the 3 icons on a Frost DK
2. Get Freezing Fog or Killing Machine to Proc without having enough RP (40 or 32 with the glyph) to use Frost Strike
3. Note that the Frost Strike icon still lights up in combat

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

I would expect the "show when other icon is shown" behaviour to be on top of the existing "cooldown: show when usable" behaviour, rather than in place of it.  In v1, if you made (for example) an item cooldown that was linked to your mana level (e.g. show Endless Mana Potion when mana < 100%) then the icon would not appear if you were < 100% and the item was on CD or otherwise unusable.

What version of the product are you using?

2.0.0-beta1

Do you have an error log of what happened?

N/A

Please provide any additional information below.

Here is an icon excerpt (all from group 1) to trigger the behaviour:

comments.body:
Check the "Power Check?" option on the frost strike icon. Otherwise it will only check the cooldown, which is none, so it will always light up.

P.S. I love you for including the settings.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
